SA19nagsaliu:3: bhoṭabhāṣāyām - hphagaspā - salu - jaṅapā - śesvyavā - thegpā - chenapoī - doī - gyācher bśadpā
SA19nagsaliu:6: tatra 'anantācintyaguṇyaṃ hi' ityādiṣu anantaguṇyamiti guṇaṃ hi balābhayāsaṃsṛṣṭādiguṇārthe devamanuṣyaiḥ pariceyatvāt,
SA19nagsaliu:15: katama iti cet, ucyate - sambuddhaṃ karuṇātmakam /
SA19nagsaliu:19: praphullakamalavad buddhervikāsād buddho, bodhatvād vā buddhaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:20: ajñānanidrā suptajaganmadhye jāgratapuruṣavat, yathāvadaviparyastasamyagjñānodayād buddha iti /
SA19nagsaliu:22_2: kleśāśīviṣabhayāplutāna itastataḥ paribhramato 'nyāṃścāpi sanmārge sanniveśya mokṣānuttaramahānagare
SA19nagsaliu:26: sa sambuddhaḥ ; karuṇātmakatāyā api bhūtatvāt saṃbuddhaḥ karuṇātmakaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:27: tasmāt taṃ buddhaṃ karuṇātmakaṃ praṇipatya śālistambamiti ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:29: praṇipatya kiṃ karomīti cet- śālistambamiti sūtrasya upanibaddhaśāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmi /
SA19nagsaliu:33: sambuddhaṃ iti buddho hi (adhigatārthatvāt) sarvajña eva /
SA19nagsaliu:35: tasmāt tādṛśaṃ sarvajñaṃ viraktaṃ sambuddhaṃ karuṇātmaka iti yaḥ sarvaṃjānan vītarāgaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:36: sa ācāryamuṣṭerabhāvād aparān yathāvagataṃ dharmaṃ diśati /
SA19nagsaliu:39: tathāpi, vivakṣitapadasya vidyamānatvād vivakṣuṇā kimiṣyate? iti praśnaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:42: śāstraṃ racayitum ādau sambandha-prayojana-abhidhānābhidheyacatuṣṭayaṃ kiṃ na nirvacanīyam?
SA19nagsaliu:51: evaṃ vādine ucyate - asambandhāditvāditi yaduktaṃ ityuktahetorasiddham uktāyām atroktau sambandhādayaścatvāraḥ santyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:53: ucyate - śālistambasūtropanibaddha-śāstrakārikāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇatvād atra sambandhaḥ syād eva /
SA19nagsaliu:54: śālistambasūtramiti tīrthikādyanyeṣu granthaviśeṣaṇatayā anupalabdhatvāt śāstramidaṃ buddhasambaddham /
SA19nagsaliu:57_1: gamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇaṃ vibhajya anuttara-samyaksaṃbuddhopalabdhiḥ atra prayojanamastyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:59: yadyad sārthakaṃ tat tat tu viracanīyam /
SA19nagsaliu:61: asyābhidhānena śālistambopamayā ādhyātmika-bāhya-pratītyasamutpāda-samupayogād anenābhidhānena śālistambamiti cāpi bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:63_0: abhidheyamiti pratītyasamutpādasya dvādaśāṅgasya sapratyayasya pṛthaktaḥ yathākramaṃ
SA19nagsaliu:63_1: lakṣaṇavyavasthāpanāt kartrādīn ahetūn pratikūlahetūn ca vihāya kleśopakleśa prahāṇāt
SA19nagsaliu:65: tasmāt cikitsādiśāstravad idaṃ śāstraṃ sambandhādisamanvitatvād, ārambhaṇīyameva/
SA19nagsaliu:77: ajātagauravāṇāṃ tu abhūtatvād hetvarthe ca siddha eva /
SA19nagsaliu:78: api śiṣṭācāra-nayapradarśanārthaṃ śāstrārambhe śāstuḥ pūjā kṛtā /
SA19nagsaliu:80: yadā kaścit prayojanārambhaṇamavatarati prathamam iṣṭadevaṃ praṇamya viśiṣṭaprayojanaṃ praviśati,
SA19nagsaliu:82: tasmād anenāpi śāstrakāreṇa tāmeva sadācāranītim anusaratā śāstrārambhaṇe svaśāsturguṇābhidhānapūrvakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā śāstravyākhyānāvatārād atra prayojanamastyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:83: ucyate - śāstrārambhe śāstre praṇāmakaraṇam na niṣphalam śāstari śāstreṣu ca gauravotpādahetvartham, nānyathā /
SA19nagsaliu:85: tasmācca paraiḥ śāstrādau praṇāmakaraṇaṃ niṣprayojanam iti kimucyate?
SA19nagsaliu:87: śāstram ārabdhuṃ praṇāmakaraṇaṃ tu cikitsādiśāstravat saprayojanam eva, na ca kākadantaparīkṣāvat /
SA19nagsaliu:88: svaśāstāraṃ praṇamya śālistambasūtropanibaddhāṃ śāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmīti ukte /
SA19nagsaliu:89: katamā ca sā iti cet - munī rājagṛhasyaiva ityādi kathitam rājagṛhaṃ tu rājño gṛham rājaprasāda ityarthaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:94: bhagavataḥ ekasmin samaye iti ekasmin samaye /
SA19nagsaliu:100_3: dhātutrayamapi cittamātram' iti avagamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇa-rahitadvāreṇa kleśā bhagnāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:101: nitya-sukha-śuci-sātmyāviparyāsacatuṣṭayādirahitaḥ anuttaradharmakāya saṃyukto 'pratiṣṭhita nirvāṇopalabdheḥ skandhaṃ mṛtyumārañca jayati /
SA19nagsaliu:102_2: mahāmaitryādi-bāṇākṣepeṇa sasainyaṃ makaradhvajaṃ prahṛtya devaputramāraṃ parājayata /
SA19nagsaliu:109: yadā tannagare kupitairamānuṣaiḥ punaḥ punaragniḥ kṣiptastadā rājāvagatya ādiśat,
SA19nagsaliu:111: adya prabhṛti yasya gṛhaṃ prathamaṃ agninā dahyate,
SA19nagsaliu:112: sa śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ gatvā gṛhaṃ nirmāya vased ityājñātavān /
SA19nagsaliu:114: tato rājā amātyānāhūyādiśat - jñānina amātyāḥ jānantu evaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:115: mayaiva tannayaprajñāpāt mayaiva tadatikramo mayi na śobhate, anayatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:117: śītavane mahāśmaśānamadhye rājaprāsādo nirmīyatām (ahaṃ) tatra gatvā vatsyāmi /
SA19nagsaliu:119: tadā prathamaṃ rājā tatra gatvā uvāsa /
SA19nagsaliu:122: yasya parvatasya śikharo gṛdhraśirovat sa gṛdhrakūṭaparvata ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:123: athavā pāpena māreṇa gṛdhrākāramabhinirmāya bhagavaccīvaraharaṇārambhe bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānenā - sāmarthyāt tatraiva nikṣiptaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:128: na, bhikṣūṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃghaiḥ sārdhaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:129: bhikṣūṇāṃ arthāt bhikṣusārdhamardhatrayodaśabhiḥ mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena bodhisattvānāṃ ca iti tu saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattva-mahāsattvaiḥ sārdham /
SA19nagsaliu:138: api ca - kimarthaṃ sthāna-kāla-parivāra-nirdeśaḥ? ucyate - cakravartirājasādharmyāt /
SA19nagsaliu:140: yadā brāhmaṇeṣu gṛhastheṣu ca anugrahādi kṛtaṃ tadā nivāsa-sthānaṃ grāma-nagarādi,
SA19nagsaliu:153: kutra kaiścit samaṃ kvāpi kasmāt kasmai ca deśitam /
SA19nagsaliu:158: tadutpādaka īśvarādiḥ ko 'pi anyo nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ / api coktam -
SA19nagsaliu:166: dvādaśāṅgaḥ bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī anyo vā yaḥ kaścit kṛtādikaṃ ahetu-pratikūlahetu-virahitaṃ paśyati, sa
SA19nagsaliu:169: aṣṭāṅgamāryadharmaṃ phaladharmādhigamasvabhāvatāṃ saskandhanirvāṇaṃ aśeṣa skandhābhidhānamapi ca yathāvat paśyati ityuktvā bhagavāṃstūṣṇīṃ bhāvamavasthitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:170: tadā ityādi tu bhikṣuśāriputro bodhisattvaṃ maitreyam upasaṃkramyedaṃ paryapṛcchat /
SA19nagsaliu:171: ityuktvā iti bhagavataḥ śāriputreṇa yatsūtraṃ śrutaṃ tad bhikṣūn uktvā upadiśya /
SA19nagsaliu:172: nāyaka iti vividhopāyanayena sattvānām nayanatvān nāyakaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:173: tūṣṇīṃbhāvamavasthitaḥ samādhiṃ samāpadya viharati sm ityadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:174: bhikṣuḥ śāriputraḥ śrutvā ityuvāca bhikṣuḥ iti - kleśabhañjanād bhikṣuḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:175: śāriputraḥ śrutvā iti tu bhagavataḥ śrutvā /
SA19nagsaliu:176: sūtre tadāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yatretyādinā deśitavān /
SA19nagsaliu:177: gatvā maitreyasannidhau tu yatra bodhisattvo maitreyo dine sadāvasthitaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:181: tathāgate 'dya maitreya uktyarthaṃ na vibhajya ca /
SA19nagsaliu:182: tṛṣṇīṃbhāve sthite cātra tadartho gamyate katham / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:183: adya maitreya ityuktvā bhikṣūn bhagavān śālistambopamādeśanayā yaduktam - maitreya! sugatoktasūtrāntārthaḥ katamaḥ?
SA19nagsaliu:189: kiṃ pratītyaṃ ca dharmaḥ kaḥ buddho 'pi katamastathā / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:190: kathaṃ ca pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyan dharmaṃ paśyati / dharmaṃ paśyan buddhaṃ paśyati? iti tu
SA19nagsaliu:191: pratītyaṃ tu kathaṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmaṃ buddhaṃ ca paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:193: sthaviraśāriputraḥ tatsandehotpādād ajitamāha / ajitastu maitreyaḥ / kiṃ viśeṣaṇako maitreyaḥ?
SA19nagsaliu:194: bhāvātmikā hi maitrī syān maitreyo 'brūta nirṇayam /
SA19nagsaliu:199: kimuktamiti cet anna bhagavatā ityādi uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:214: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:216: tatra pratītyasamutpādo nāma sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyayaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:218: api ca - avidyādibhavāṅgādīnām ayaṃ sambhavakramaḥ kathamavagantavyaḥ?
SA19nagsaliu:220: karma ca katamad iti cet? ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:223: sa ca pratītyasamutpādo bāhya ādhyātmikaśca pṛthaktvād dvividho vyavasthāpitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:227: asati ca bīje aṅkurānutpādāt, na hi phalotpāda iti /
SA19nagsaliu:229: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
SA19nagsaliu:230: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:231: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkura-puṣpābhyām abhinirvartita iti /
SA19nagsaliu:232: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāt phalaparyantaṃ prādurbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:239: bījaṃ pṛthivyādau kiṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā hetoḥ pratyayaṃ matamiti /
SA19nagsaliu:246: yadāvikalo bhavati, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyād tadbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:247: pṛthivyādau rnaivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ bījasaṃdhāraṇādi karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:248: bījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ eteṣāṃ pratyayena saṃdhāraṇādi kāryeṇa hitaṃ karomi /
SA19nagsaliu:249: atha punaḥ pṛthivyādiṣu satsu bījādaṅkurādi prādurbhavati, asatsu ca na bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:252: ityādi / bhavāṅgo yeṣāmavidyādimaraṇāntam asti, te avidyādi maraṇaparyantāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:253: tasmāttarhi bhavantyeva duḥkhaskandhā hi kevalam / tasmād iti tu avidyādi kramaśaḥ prādurbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:254: duḥkhaskandhastu duḥkha-samūhaḥ / kevalamiti ātmātmīyaviyuktaḥ / bhavati iti tu utpadyate /
SA19nagsaliu:261: tasmāt kudṛṣṭitvāt mithyā mārgācaraṇena aniṣṭavipākābhinirvartitatvāt hetu-karma-phalāni apavādāropākāreṇa praviṣṭatvān mithyādṛṣṭiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:264: samyakmārgopayogād abhīṣṭaphalābhinirhāratvād anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyā-dyākāreṇa praviṣṭa tvāt samyakdṛṣṭiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:273: cintanaṃ ca idamidaṃ kariṣya iti ādau citte nidhāya kāya-vāk-citta-caryākuśalaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:286: -nairātmyādi-rūpeṇa pravṛtteḥ sarvārya janāvisaṃvādinī samyaṅmārgānusāritvāt samyagvāg ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:314: yā kāyavākcittacaryāsvaparopakāra-mātrakuśalapravṛtyā āryamārgam anusarati sā samyagvyāyāmatvāt samyakvyāyāmaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:323: guṇānusmaraṇaṃ pūrvīkṛtya buddha-dharma-saṃgha-śīla-tyāga-devādyanusmaraṇaṃ samyaksmṛtiḥ mārgāṅgam eva ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:326: sa tu mithyāpi san, samādhirapi bhūtatvān mithyāsamādhiḥ mithyeti tu viparyayaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:328: api tu-rūpādi-bāhyavastūni anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyākārīṇi nitya-sukha-śucyātma dṛṣṭayāditayā adhyavasīya teṣu ālambanapūrvakaṃ yaccittaspharaṇam,
SA19nagsaliu:338: evam yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:340: viśuddhātmā hi yaḥ paśyed dharmatathyaṃ sa paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:354: ādimadhyāntarahitam advayaṃ dhātutrayavirahitaṃ kāya-vāk-cittakarmasamatikrāntaṃ maṇiratnarājavividharūpasadṛśaṃ guṇamaṇivividhaprabhābhiḥ nirantaraṃ jagadarthakāri śāntaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:360: tathoktamāryaṃ dṛṣṭatvād yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:365: yaḥ paśyatīti yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ dharmañcaivaṃ paśyati sa dharmajaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:367: tatrātra pratītyasamutpādaḥ kīdṛśa ukta iti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:369: prāṇādirahitād yaśca iti tu yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satataṃ prāṇādirahitaṃ prāṇarahitam,
SA19nagsaliu:376: imāni sarvāṇi bāhyābhyantarāṇi vastūni sajīvāni indriyānvitāni /
SA19nagsaliu:379: ye prāṇinaḥ prāṇino na bhakṣanti te prāṇinastu mokṣaṃ prāpnuvantīti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:384: te 'pi parasparamanyonyakalpanā-parikalpanā-vikalpa-rahitvāt tṛṇa-vṛkṣa-bhitti-dharmasadṛśā acalāḥ niṣkriyāśca tasmāt prāṇādirahitatvād ajīvāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:393: bāhyavastuṣu sūryasya candrasya ca sparśavaśena layo vistaraśca anumīyete /
SA19nagsaliu:395: vāyusañcāravaśād vṛkṣa-śākhādi-kampanānumānāt teṣāṃ gamanāgamanaṃ kuta upalabhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:397: chinne utpāda iti ayam artho 'siddha eva iti darśayitum ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:398: yadi so 'pi sacetanaḥ syat, kasmāt chedanāvasthāyāṃ prāṇātipattītyādi duḥkhaṃ nānubhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:399: anicchādicaryāṃ prārthanādiṃ vā tato 'nyatragamanaṃ vālpamapi na kurvanti /
SA19nagsaliu:403: sacetanānām aṅga-pratyaṅgādicchedānutpāda-dharmitvād acetanatāyā eva prasaṅgo jāyate /
SA19nagsaliu:418: vyupaśāntyantamiti tu upaśamam ante darśayituṃ vyupaśamaparyantam /
SA19nagsaliu:419: yastu etādṛśanayena dharmaṃ satatam ajīvādisvabhāvaṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:420: pratītyaṃ dharmabuddhau ca śuddhibuddhayā hi paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:424: āryadharmamabhisaṃbudhya iti tu yo pāpadharmāṇāṃ pāre arthāt dūre sa āryaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:428: anuttaramiti tatpūrvaṃ viśiṣṭadharmasya abhāvaḥ, tasmāt tad evānuttaramityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:429: dharmakāya iti dharmakāya eva dharmakāyaḥ, niśādā-putravat /
SA19nagsaliu:431: tathāpi yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmakṛtānuttarabodhyaśaikṣasvabhāvatāṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:432: yena sa āryajñānagocaradharmaṃ tādṛśaṃ svayathāvad abhisaṃbodheḥ dharmajñaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:433: dharmanirmāṇaṃ dharmadarśanam buddhadarśanam iti bhagavatā uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:435: kasmāt pratītyasamutpāda ucyate iti cet / tasmāduktam -
SA19nagsaliu:438: bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaṃ saṃkṣepeṇoktam, etatpratyayasyaiva phalam / tasmāduktam /
SA19nagsaliu:439: buddhotpādo bhavenno vā sthiteyaṃ dharmatā yataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:442: atrāhetuḥ pratikūlahetuḥ vā pravartako nivartako vā ko 'pi nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:443: tasmāt tathāgatānāmutpādādvā anutpādād vā dharmato dharmasthitito dharmaniyamataśca eṣa pravāhaḥ, ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:444: yadi pratyayarahitena ekenaiva hetunā bhāvā utpadya tiṣṭhanti,
SA19nagsaliu:445: yadi pratyayo 'pi hetumanapekṣya kiñcidutpādayituṃ samarthaḥ cettadā te sthitā asthitā iti vaktuṃ yujyeta,
SA19nagsaliu:446: teṣāmutpādaḥ phalodbhavo 'pi nāhetor na cāpratyayāt tathāgatānāmutpādo vānutpādo vā eṣā dharmatā dharmasthitatā ca āditaḥ pravartete //
SA19nagsaliu:447: tadyathā - pratītyasamutpādasya dharma etatpratyayatāphalamiti bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa uktaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:451: hetupratyaya-kramavat pratītyasamutpādasamateti hetvabhāve pratyayāpravṛttiḥ pratyayābhāve ca na hetu-pravṛttiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:459: evamapi pratītyasamutpādo 'yam ityādi hetupratyayadvividhatvād hetupratyayobhayārtha pratītyasamutpādasya kramo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:464: evaṃ bāhyādhyātmikaviśeṣeṇa pṛthag hetupratyayānāṃ lakṣaṇa-bhedaḥ kīdṛśa iti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:466: tatra katamo bāhyaḥ sahetukaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti uktvā tadidam - bījādaṅkuraḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:470: nālādgaṇḍaḥ gaṇḍād garbham [garbhācchūkaḥ] puṣpāt phalam ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:473: ṣaḍvidha iti tu pṛthivyādayaḥ ṣaḍvidhāḥ / tasmāttūktam -
SA19nagsaliu:477: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkurādi abhinirvartayāmi iti /
SA19nagsaliu:478: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījādinā abhinirvartitaḥ iti /
SA19nagsaliu:479: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:480: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti /
SA19nagsaliu:481: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāditaḥ phalādi paryantaṃ prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:484: pratyayastu pṛthivyādi kālāntaṃ hi yathā kramam /
SA19nagsaliu:485: tasmādeva kathaṃ bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya ityādi uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:486: bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandhāḥ katidhā draṣṭavyā ityuktam ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
SA19nagsaliu:488: pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātūnāṃ yathākramaṃ samavāyād bāhyapratītyasamutpādasyeti pratyayatā yathākramam /
SA19nagsaliu:490: eṣām hetupratyayānāṃ katamasya karma katamad iti cet? tasmād uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:493: tatra pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karotīti bījamaṅkurotpādonmukhamāśrayatvāt kaṭhinatvameva ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:495: tejo dhātuḥ paripācayatīti paripuṣṭayavasare upapadyamāne paraspara-sparśeṇoṣṇatā eva paripāka iti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:497: svāvasthāyāḥ samuddhṛtya bahirā nayanād vāyudhāturbījamabhinirharati vardhayatīti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:500: ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmanakṛtyaṃ karotīti ṛturapi sarvākāraṃ abhinirharati /
SA19nagsaliu:503: vaikalye tu na prādurbhāvaḥ / tasmādeva uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:504: no cet pratyayasāmagrī bīje bhūte 'pi nāṅkuraḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:506: tasmādeva uktam / sarvasamavāyād bīje niruddhe tato 'bhinirhāraḥ syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:509: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃghātakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:510: tadvat jale agnau, vāyau, ākāśe, ṛtau cāpi naivaṃ bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:514: na svato parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:516: svata iti hetupratyayābhāve svata utpādaḥ / svabhāvavādina evaṃ kalpanta iti śrūyate /
SA19nagsaliu:518: atra na kaścidutpadyate na ca kaścin nirudhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:525: tasmād vastūnāṃ svabhāvata utpādo na yujyate, utpattimatvād ghaṭādivat /
SA19nagsaliu:526: yasyānusāraṃ bhāvāḥ satataṃ sthitāḥ tadanusāram utpāda-kriyā-karma-sthiti-vināśā api na yujyante,
SA19nagsaliu:528: tasmād atra doṣasya prasajyamānatvān na svata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:529: bhāvānām svata utpādaścet nityamutpādaprasaṃgaḥ syāt, ākāśavat /
SA19nagsaliu:530: kasyacidapi kutrāpi kadāpi utpādo nirodho vā nāstīti cet- ucyate- pratyakṣavirodhaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:531: evaṃ bhāvānāṃ hetupratyayād utpādo bhāsate, tasmāt tāvad bhāvānāṃ na svabhāvata utpādaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:536: tathā sati gamana-āgamana-calana-kampana-nirākaraṇa-manyanā-kriyā-karmāṇi tatraiva anyatrāpi ca pravartante /
SA19nagsaliu:541: ayaṃ hetuḥ śayanopamayā na yujyate saṃghātatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:543: katham ātmā asaṃghātaḥ san svaśarīrābhāve śayanādīn aṅgasaṃghān svarūpeṇopakartuṃ yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:546: ātmanaḥ saṃghātatvād hetupratyayayorutpādopalabdha ātmātmīya iti manyanākārapravṛtteḥ cittamevātmā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:547: atrāntaḥ karaṇapuruṣaḥ kūrmakeśasvabhāvavad yuktyanumānarahitastu kvacinnāstīti darśayitum bhagavatā bāhyādhyātmikabhāvānāṃ parata utpādo na yujyata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:548: yadi bhāvānāṃ svato 'pi notpādo na ca parato 'pi,
SA19nagsaliu:549: tadā bhāvānāṃ dvividha utpāda iti cet,
SA19nagsaliu:551: na dvayoḥ na ca kālata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:553: anye tu svaparayoḥ sambandhād bhāvotpādaṃ manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:555: tathāpi svato 'nupalabdhatvāt parataścābhāvāt na dvayoḥ ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:556: hetu-pratyayātiriktaṃ na svato na parata iti bhagavatā uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:558: tadā paratantreṇa kartrā utpādavināśau bhaviṣyata iti kaiściducyate /
SA19nagsaliu:559: anye tīrthikāstu karttā nāma kaścid ādyaḥkartā,
SA19nagsaliu:561: sa eva bāhyamābhyantarañcedaṃ sarvam utpādayati vināśayatīti manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:564: atha kasyeti cet- hetupratyayasambandhād bhāvānāṃ pravṛttirbhāsate /
SA19nagsaliu:565: kartustu ākāśavan nirvikāratvāt tadadhīnā utpāda-sthitivināśāśca naiva yujyante /
SA19nagsaliu:566: kasmāditi cet, karttari nirvikāra-niṣkriyākāśātmani kriyā karma ca kiñcidapi nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:567: utpadyamānā bhāvā hetupratyayāpekṣāḥ pravṛtti-kramodbhūtā eva bhāsante /
SA19nagsaliu:568: yadanusāraṃ karttāramapekṣate pravṛttistadanusāraṃ bhāvānām utpāda-sthiti-vināśāśca sadā āsannā bhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:569: karturnityatvād bhāvānām utpādao-sthiti-vināśā yugapad bhaviṣyanti athavā utpāda-sthiti-vināśā na bhaviṣyanti /
SA19nagsaliu:570: nityatvāt kvacidapi kiñcidapi utpādo vā vināśo vā na syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:571: hetuṃ pratyayañca apekṣya pravartamānānāṃ bhāvānāmeva kartṛ-kriyā-hetuphalotpādasamaḥ kramodbhava upalabhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:573: avikārahetubhiḥ parasparamāśritya pravartamānaiḥ utpādaniyamo na yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:576: hetau phale ca saṃbhinne 'vikārastu kathaṃ bhavet /
SA19nagsaliu:578: kriyānanvitavandhyāputrātmani kasyāścit kriyāyāḥ karmaṇo vā niyatena ayuktatvād bhagavaddharmeṣu avisaṃvāditvād bhāvotpādakriyā karttāraṃ nāpekṣate,
SA19nagsaliu:579: kintu sati hetupratyayasaṅgrahe bhāvānāmutpādavināśau yujyeta ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:587: sukha-duḥkhādayaḥ svargo vimokṣaśca tāni sarvāṇi cittotpādamātreṇoddhṛtānīti vadanti /
SA19nagsaliu:590: gatānugatikāścaiva yuktiviśeṣarahite tasmin gauravapravaṇatvāt pūrvottaraviruddhaṃ bālayuvakacāṇḍālavadayathārtha pratyakṣādiviruddhaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:596: yuktyāgamādiviruddhaṃ ca vāṅmātreṇa pakṣīkṛtya nijājñānapaṭalena netrācchādanatvād asamarthatvāt paśubhūtāstu paśubhyo 'pyatichudratarāḥ paśavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:598: utpāde sthitau ca sahetuka evābhyupagamyamāne sati nityavādabhaṅgatvād vādotsargaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:600: icchāmātreṇa utpāde sati yugapadeva sampūrṇajagata utpādasthiti-vināśāḥ syuḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:615: ekāntakriyāyuktā yuktayorgāmbhīryaguṇasya rūpādervā ālambana cintanasyaiva ayuktatvāt, tattu pratikūlam /
SA19nagsaliu:616: hetāvasati sarvatra pratyaya eva kathaṃ bhavet /
SA19nagsaliu:618: bhāvakartā maheśaścet so 'pi kartā na manyate /
SA19nagsaliu:619: pitrabhāve sutotpattiḥ sā neṣṭā dṛśyate na ca /
SA19nagsaliu:623: tathā maheśvare nitye bhāvānāṃ syāt sadodbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:628: tasmādīśvarakartṛtvābhyupagame bahudoṣasaṃbhavād bhagavatā bhāvānām utpādaḥ īśvarakṛto na yujyate ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:629: pare tu sarvaṃ kālena vivartitaṃ manyante / tairevamucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:639: sa nityaścettadā tatra kriyāpekṣā na yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:646: sūryacandra-nakṣatra-parva-vatsarādi-bāhyābhyantarabhāvānāṃ gatagamyasvabhāvatvāt kālākhyayā bhāvānāmutpāda-sthiti-vināśāstu kālapariṇāmatvena na yujyante/
SA19nagsaliu:647: anyacca, svabhāvavādina āntarabāhyān sarvabhāvān svabhāvodbhavān manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:648: bhāvānāṃ svabhāva eva, kasyacidbhāvasya utpādasya vināśasya vā kaścidapi heturnāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:652: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sadā sthitam /
SA19nagsaliu:655: vikāro vartate yatra nirvikāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA19nagsaliu:659: kule rājani kṣetrādau tatphalaṃ cāpi bhāsate /
SA19nagsaliu:660: svabhāve vikṛte jāte nityavādī tu bhraṃsate /
SA19nagsaliu:662: evaṃ svabhāvavādiṣvapi parasparavirodhatvād utpāda-sthiti-vināśānāṃ svabhāvād udbhavo na yujyata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:663: atha bhāvānām utpāda-sthiti-vināśā ahetuto bhavanti ityapare 'hetuvādino hetuṃ vinaiva kevalam bhāvānāmutpāda-nirodhau kalpayanti /
SA19nagsaliu:667: tasmāttasyaiva doṣasya prasajyamānatvād ahetuvādo 'pi lokādi-viruddhatvād asiddha eva /
SA19nagsaliu:669: na svataḥ parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:672: iti tu anādi-kālataḥ prapañca-vāsanābījasya avicchinna-nadīstrotaḥ-pravāhavad anupravṛtteḥ
SA19nagsaliu:674: tasmādeva sūtre atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātusamavāyād bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:675: 'atha punaḥ' iti tu abhāvādudbhava-sva-para-dvaya-īśvarādi-rahita-bīja-pṛthivyādi-sāmagryā eva aṅkurādi utpadyata iti uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:677: pañcabhirhetubhiriti tu hetupañcakairiti, bāhyasyeti bījādeḥ / 'pratītyotpāda' iti pratītyam /
SA19nagsaliu:678: śāśvatato na cocchedān na saṅkrānteḥ parīttataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:685: na ca niruddhād, tathāpi bījanirodhe aṅkura utpadyate /
SA19nagsaliu:686: tasmān na śāśvatato, na cocchedāditi na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate nācāpyaniruddhād /
SA19nagsaliu:687: api tu bījād niruddhāt tasminneva samaye 'ṅkuro utpadyate /
SA19nagsaliu:689: na saṃkrāntitaḥ iti tu bījāṅkurau tu asadṛśau eva /
SA19nagsaliu:694: sadṛśānuprabodhād iti tu yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśameva phalābhinirvṛtiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:703: upte śālyādi bīje hi śyāmākādiphalaṃ na hi /
SA19nagsaliu:710: dvidhā hetuścapratyaya iti tu ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo hetūpanibandhanaḥ pratyayopanibandhanaśca dvayākāro 'vagantavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:711: iṣṭa iti abhīṣṭasya ca abhipretasya abhimatasya cetyadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:714: tatrādāvavidyādeśanād ādau avidyā, ante maraṇāṅgadeśanatvān mṛtyurante /
SA19nagsaliu:715: yattayormadhye syāt tat tu madhya iṣyate /
SA19nagsaliu:727: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:742: evam ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśāṅgaḥ trisvabhāvatayā veditavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:745: avidyā yadi nādau syādante mṛtyurna saṃbhaved /
SA19nagsaliu:746: 'avidyā yadi nādau syād' iti tu yadi avidyā cennābhaviṣyan naiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante /
SA19nagsaliu:747: tadvad jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ cennābhaviṣyan naiva śokādi prajñāsyate /
SA19nagsaliu:748: tebhyo bhinno na kutrāpi hyātmātmīyaśca vidyate /
SA19nagsaliu:749: tatrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃskārādi abhinirvartayāmītyato jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ śokādi abhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:751: evam yāvajjarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirabhinirvartitā iti /
SA19nagsaliu:759: asyeti tu ādhyātmikasya/ pratyayastu sāmagrī ṣaṭ prakārakā iti ṣaḍvidhāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:761: vijñānasyānte parideśanatvād 'ante vijñānam' / ādike dharā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:762: tasmāt sūtre -ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśa-vijñānādistvādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:766: anyacca asmin kāye yatkiñcidasti tatsarvaṃ saṃgṛhya pṛthivīdhāturucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:767: anugraha tu saṃgrahaḥ, sambandho-mṛduḥ, āliṅganaṃ, piṇḍīkaraṇaṃ snigdhatā ca /
SA19nagsaliu:770: anyacca yatkiñcitkaṃ tādṛśaṃ tatsarvaṃ tu tejodhāturucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:772: śvāsastu ucchvāsaḥ, āśvāso, bhāṣaṇaṃ, pralāpo, gamanāgamanaṃ kṣayo vṛddhiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:783: ūrdhvavāyuradhovāyuranyaccāpi etatkāyamadhye yatkiñcit tādṛśamasti tatsarvam ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya vāyudhāturityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:791: tataḥ kliṣṭaṃ manaścāpi iti kleśamayaṃ manaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:792: tāni ca caturmahābhūtāni ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya naḍakalāpayogena nāmarūpamityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:793: tatra nāmeti catvāro 'rūpaskandhāḥ-vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskāro vijñānaṃ ceti /
SA19nagsaliu:794_0: rūpaṃ nāma pitroḥ śukraśoṇitodbhūtaṃ antarābhavamāśritya yat prathamaṃ nāmarūpābhinirvartanaṃ
SA19nagsaliu:798: ātmotkarṣaścetyetatkleśasaṃyutaṃ kliṣṭaṃ mana iti ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtaṃ nāmarūpamityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:805: asya kartrādi na vartate iti bhāvaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:807: iti tu asmābhirete utpāditā iti ca tairvayamutpāditā iti te 'nyonya vikalpaṃ notpādayanti /
SA19nagsaliu:808: teṣu satsu samutpādaḥ teṣvasatsu na saṃbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:819: 'na strī', na pumān - na napuṃsakastu ādhyātmikastrī puruṣa-napuṃsakātmakaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:820: na cāhaṃ mam iti tu ātmātmīya-manyanā-viyuktatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:831: na napuṃsakam na cāhaṃ na mama syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:832: na ceśvarādi anyat kiñcid iti jñātavyam /
SA19nagsaliu:840: ucyate - tatra kāmadhātuḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadāśrayanikāyavijñaptyavabhāsaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇa-svabhāvena ekapiṇḍatvena kalpayan saṃjñayā grahaṇatvād avidyeti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:841: tatra ṣaṭtriṃśadāśrayanikāyāstu aṣṭau uṣṇasvabhāvā mahānarakāḥ, śītasvabhāvāḥ aṣṭau mahānarakāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:844: pratyekaḥ prādeśikaśca narakaḥ, pretāśrayaḥ, tiryagāśrayaḥ, asurāāśrayaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:847_1: sthitvā svakarmavaśena vijñaptyavabhāsa-vikalpodbhavānāṃ yadajñānaṃ seyamavidyā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:853: tadbhinnavibhāgena sthitaṃ parvata-aṭavī-vana-udyāna-nadī-grāmādiṣu svakarma-vaśāt prajñaptāvabhāsa-vikalpanodbhūtamanyasthānānāṃ yadajñānaṃ tadapi avidyetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:854: naraka-sattvānāṃ svakarmavaśitānukūlavikalpanodbhavānāṃ tu anavataptamahāsāgarād viṃśatisāhasra-yojanādhobhājanasya vijñapti-svabhāvamūlabhūteṣu anyasthāneṣvabhi-nirvṛttiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:865: svavijñānāvabhāsavikalpanāvaśenodbhūtaṃ vibhinnaprapaṃca-vāsanāliptaṃ tādṛśaṃ yadajñānam idamapi avidyetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:868: caturmahārājakāyikāḥ - trāyastriṃśo, yāmaḥ, tuṣito, nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaśca /
SA19nagsaliu:875: evaṃ pṛthaggati-yoni-bahutva-bhedena vibhinna-sattvabhājanalokā ityākhyātāḥ sādhāraṇā-sādhāraṇaviśeṣādipiṇḍagrahodbhūta ekataḥ saṃkṣipya kāmadhāturityucyate / parañcoktam -
SA19nagsaliu:877: narā dvādaśa, ṣaḍ devāḥ ṣoḍaśa narakāstathā /
SA19nagsaliu:899: paramāṇūnāṃ parasparaṃ saṃcayātmakatvāt piṇḍagrāho na yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:912: evaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ tadanityādisvabhāvasya yadajñānaṃ iyamavidyetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:913: tatra avidyeti tu vidyā na bhūtatvād avidyā /
SA19nagsaliu:914: na tu vidyābhāvaḥ, abhāvastu na kiñcidapi /
SA19nagsaliu:916: tasmād abhāvo niṣedho 'pi nāsti, paratvamapi nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:918: avidyā tu na vidyābhāvaḥ vidyādharmato viruddhā avidyeti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:920: tadudbhavaḥ sattva bhājanaloka-svabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ, asādhāraṇaśca viśeṣavikalpavaśasambhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:938: jñānaṃ samādhiḥ rūpaṃ ca vaśitāprativedinaḥ / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:949: tatpratyayāt tannidānācca vidyāyāṃ rāga-dveṣa-moha-ahaṃkāra-dṛṣṭi-saṃśaya-īrṣyā-mātsaryānugāmanād akuśala-kāyakarmata ātmano jñānasya ca paritrāṇārtha prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:956: tatra avidyayā iti avidyā-pratyayena saṃskārabhāvābhisaṃskāritvād vibhāvitaṃ saṃskārabhāva-prativijñaptisvabhāvaṃ vijñānamabhinirvartate / tasmādeva
SA19nagsaliu:959: tataḥ iti tu saṃskāramāśritya bhāvānāṃ vijñaptiriti tu vijñāpakatvād vijñaptiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:962: iti vijñānena sahodgatā iti tu vijñānasya hetuta udbhūtāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:972: iti yatpūrvaṃ indriye satṛṣṇavāsanānāmarūpaṃ sthāpitaṃ tannāmarūpaṃ saṃniśritya cakṣurādi-ṣaḍindriyābhinirvartanena indriyasya ṣaḍāyatanāni prādurbhavantīti /
SA19nagsaliu:978: indriyavijñānaṃ rūpādiviṣayeṣu sparśa iva nirāntarameva pravartate /
SA19nagsaliu:980: asaṃcita-pañcavijñānāni saṃcita viṣayendriyaiḥ saha yugapadekatra bhūtatvāt sparśavanti santi,
SA19nagsaliu:982: tasmādeva bhagavatāpi trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:984: tadvat sparśarasāsvādaniyantraṇe ṣaṭsparśā kāyānāśritya ṣaḍvedanākāyā utpadyante /
SA19nagsaliu:987: vedanā tu sparśeṇa janitā sparśahetūdbhavā ityadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:991: vedanāvabhāsākāravijñapti vikalpanāvaśodbhūtānāṃ trivargabhedena ṣaḍvedanākāyotpādād bhagavatā sparśasahabhavā vedanetyuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:992: tadvat kiñcidvedanāsvādasaktā abhiniveśātmikā hi vedanāhetukī tṛṣṇeti tṛṣṇodbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:995: rāgo 'dhyavasānam, abhilāṣaḥ, āsaktiraviyogākāṃkṣā, nandanaṃ, prema ityadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:996: sā ca indriyaviṣayavijñānabhedena tṛṣṇākāyaḥ ṣaḍdhā vyavasthāpitā /
SA19nagsaliu:1021_1: caryāvyakti-indriyabhraṃśa-smṛtibhraṃśāḥ iti tādṛśī tu jāti-pratyayena bhinirvartita-skandhānāṃ
SA19nagsaliu:1057: atha mama priyavastu-iṣṭavastu-viyogo bhaviṣyati iti khidyamānasya santāpācchoka ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1078: he bhārya iti anekadhā pralāpo mithyāpadanirnādotpannaḥ pailottakasaṃtāpo daurmanasyam /
SA19nagsaliu:1079: tasmāt śokataścāpalāpo yo daurmanasyaṃ sa ucyate / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1089: yad anyadetādṛśādi upakleśaḥ, sa tu kleśo 'pyucyate, upāyāsa ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1090: tatra eṣāṃ dvādaśabhavāṅgānām anvartha nāmāni darśayituṃ - tamo 'bhijñānāmarūpāyatasparśavittarṣataḥ / ityuktam / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1102: bhāvārthena jātiḥ, pākārthena jarā / vināśārthena maraṇam / śocanārthena śokaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1114: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ vibhinnāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ, apuṇyopagāḥ, āneñjyopagāḥ/
SA19nagsaliu:1115: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1123: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati, tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA19nagsaliu:1128: āsvādanādhyavasānādhyavasāyasthānādātmapriyarūpa-sātarūpa-viyogo mābhūditi yasya bhūyaḥ praṇidhānamiyaṃ tṛṣṇā pratyayopādānetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1129: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca sa upādāna-pratyayo bhava ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1130: tatkarmanirjātānāṃ pañcaskandhānām abhinirvṛttiryā sā bhavapratyayo jātirityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1133: pūrvapūrvāṅgānāmuttarottarāṇāṃ hetutvāt, tāni uttarodbhavāt pratyaya eva /
SA19nagsaliu:1147: atha cemānyasya catvāryaṅgāni hetuḥ saṃghātakārakāṇi ca,
SA19nagsaliu:1148: dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA19nagsaliu:1150: avidyā ca tṛṣā karma vijñānaṃ kramaśo matāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1163: vijñāne na karomīdaṃ na vijñānamito matam /
SA19nagsaliu:1164: tatra karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ityādi tu karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñāna-bījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi/
SA19nagsaliu:1165: tṛṣṇāyā api ityādi tu evaṃ tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1166: avidyāyā api ityādi tu avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakiromīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1167: vijñānasyāpi ityādi tu naivaṃ bhavati ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti /
SA19nagsaliu:1171: avidyā-svavaskara iti svavaskareṇa ca sadṛśena svavaskaraṃ sarveṣvanugata-tvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1176: iti tu hetu pratyayasāmagyā utpādastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati / nāmarūpāṅkuram ityādestu /
SA19nagsaliu:1178: nāmarūpāṅkuramidaṃ tu svayaṃ parata ubhayādito notpannam / atha kīdṛśam iti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:1180: piturmātuḥ samāgamād ityādi tu pitṛmātṛsaṃyogo vā saktiḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:1186: svayaṃ gandharvasyāpi citta-viparyaye 'pi mātāpitṛkriyādhimuktau garbhotpādakrameṇa kalala-arbuda-peśī-ghana-praśākhāvasthāmatikramya prasūtasya,
SA19nagsaliu:1191: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād-ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyāttatrāsvādaviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
SA19nagsaliu:1195: tasmād asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyādityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1196: asvāmikeṣu iti tu antaḥ karaṇaṃ puruṣādi anupalambhanasvabhāvamasti /
SA19nagsaliu:1201: māyālakṣaṇa-svabhāva iti yathā māyā tu abhūtāpi vividhavyavahāraṃ pratipādayati,
SA19nagsaliu:1203: hetupratyaya-saṃnipāta-vyatiriktaṃ hetupratyayādidharmaḥ kiñcidapi na utpadyate, vinaśyati vā /
SA19nagsaliu:1208: tasmāt cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañcālokañcākāśañca tajjamanasikārañca ityādi uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1209: tatra cakṣuriti rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ vikalaṃ bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1211: āloka iti candra-nakṣatrāgni-auṣadhi-maṇi-prabhānām abhivyaktyai āloko 'pi upasthitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1215: cakṣurvijñānasya pratyayeṣu kasyacidapyabhāve na cakṣurvijñānasyotpādaḥ, sati cotpādo bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1216: mayā te janitā iti / vikalpo na yathodeti
SA19nagsaliu:1217: iti tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati 'ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśraya-kṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1218: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyālambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1219: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1220: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1221: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhāra-kṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1223: atha ca punaḥ satsveṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati / asatsveṣu na bhavati / evaṃ
SA19nagsaliu:1237: asmāditi tu asmāllokāt paraṃ lokam athavā paralokād amuṃ lokaṃ kaściddharmo na saṃkrāmati /
SA19nagsaliu:1238: yadyevaṃ nityavādo vā ahetu-pratikūla-hetuvādo vā bhaviṣyatīti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:1241: tatra saṅkrāntyabhāve 'pi karmaphalāvināśitvaṃ pratyakṣānumāna-viśvastāgama-prakhyātena anenodāharaṇena jñātavyam /
SA19nagsaliu:1257: kartṛkriyāvihīnaṃ tad iti tatra kartā kriyā ca na staḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1258: kiṃ tannocchidyata iti cet- tathotpādāvabhāsanam ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1259: kathaṃ kartṛvihīnaṃ kriyā karma ca bhaviṣyatīti ucyate- pūrvavṛddhikramācca syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1261: parītto dakapātrānte dṛśyate na ca krāmati /
SA19nagsaliu:1264: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'bhyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1270: api ca, tadyathāgnirupādāne pratyaye sati jvalati upādāna-vaikalyānna jvalati /
SA19nagsaliu:1271: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatropapattyāyatana-pratisandhau mātuḥkukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
SA19nagsaliu:1274: tatra bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya kriyākarma-vyavasthā tu kalpanātmikā jñeyā /
SA19nagsaliu:1288: aparādhīno viśvarūpamaṇiratnarāja iva anuttaro dharmakāya ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1296: yasmādanye maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā anya aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1297: na tu ya eva maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1299: ya eva vināśa-hetussa evāpi aupapattiko bhaviṣyati /
SA19nagsaliu:1300: ato maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante aupapattyaṃśikā skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:1302: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu maraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu iti niruddhaya na ciraṃ gatatvād aupapattyaṃśikā iti aupapattyaṃśe niśritatvād aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:1305: tada-yuktatvāduktam- api tu maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,
SA19nagsaliu:1306: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikā skandhā prārdubhavanti,
SA19nagsaliu:1308: ato nocchedataḥ, visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti /
SA19nagsaliu:1309: ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttakarma kriyate, vipulaḥ phalavipāko 'nubhūyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1313_0: yaḥ kaścid imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyakpraṇītamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā
SA19nagsaliu:1340: tucchata iti muktātmano hrasvalohavad ekāntasya abhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1346: anityata iti sahopapādavināśaḥ skandhāt pṛthaganyana svabhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1348: śūnyata iti kalpanā svabhāvatayā abhūta-parikalpanāyāḥ pṛthakatvābhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1352: kiṃ kathaṃ vā kutaḥ kena kalpavādādi hānitaḥ/
SA19nagsaliu:1354: tathatārthaṃ sa eva pūrvāntaṃ na pratisarati ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1357: ahaṃ devo vā gandharvo vā kiṃ sukhavihāro duḥkhavihāro 'bhūvamityayaṃ moho'bhāva eva /
SA19nagsaliu:1358: ahaṃ sugatau durgatau vā, ciram, aciram vā kathamabhūvamiti moho 'pyabhāva eva /
SA19nagsaliu:1360: kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani iti ca āhosvinna bhaviṣyāmi iti moho 'pyatra nāstyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:1361: kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani iti anāgate 'dhvani devo vā piśāco vā naro vā kiṃ vā bhaviṣyāmīti atra mohasyāpyanudbhava eva /
SA19nagsaliu:1362: sukhī vā duḥkhī vā surūpo vā kurūpo vā kathaṃ bhaviṣyāmi iti moho 'pyatra nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:1363: antarapi na pratisarati iti antarna muhyati /
SA19nagsaliu:1364: kiṃ nvidamiti ātmā nirātmā vā iti /
SA19nagsaliu:1365: kathaṃ nvidamiti kiṃ sarūpo 'thavā virūpo veti moho 'tra nodbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1366: ke santa iti sukṛta-karmakāriṇaḥ duṣkṛta-karmakāriṇo veti na mohotpādaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1367: ayaṃ sattvo devagaternaragatervā kuta āgata itaścyuto deveṣu manuṣyeṣu narake prete tiryañci vā kutra gamiṣyatīti moho 'tra na sambhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1374: viparītadhāraṇā-samutthānārthaṃ pudgalavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu punargamanatvāt pudgala iti skandha-vyatiriktaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1375: yasyāmuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā paraloka-gamanasya paralokaṃ vihāya amuṃ etallokagamanasya cābhāvāt grahaṇa-durviparītagrahaṇamityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1386: amunau munisaṃjñayā ṣaḍjagaccakra-praviṣṭa-buddhimato gamanaṃ gamyaṃ ca saṃsāramevānusaranti na tu nirvāṇamiti /
SA19nagsaliu:1387: teṣāṃ samyak prajñayā darśane caturvidhaviparyaya-rahitatvāt samucchinnamūlāni tālavṛkṣamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpāda-nirodhadharmāṇi iti / tasmādevoktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1393: tathā iti yathā candrasya rūpe dūrasthite 'pi parīttajalabhājaneṣu jale vipulatailapātreṣu vā avabhāsate /
SA19nagsaliu:1394: candrarūpasaṃkrāntiranekatvaṃ vāpi nāsti, tathāpi anekajalapātreṣu dṛśyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1395: evam asmānna kaściccyuto na gato nāgato, hetupratyayavaikalyāt cyuti-gamanāgamanāvabhāsāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1396: tadvajjalabhājanavat sattvasantānasya jagataḥ sthānāntareṣu bahurūpeṇa cittacandrabimbotpādaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:1402: karmakleśa-lipta-cittasantānaṃ vahnistrotonibaddhamindhanaṃ tu karmakleśata eva syāditi parīkṣyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1405: tadvad atrāpi karmakleśendhanamucchidya saṃkleśālaya-vijñānabījao-santāne jñānāgni-saṃyogād dagdhe sati hetu-nirodhān na phalodbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1406: tasmādevoktam - yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇa-brāhmāṇānāṃ tadyathā iti ito bāhyānām lokastu lokaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1411: tadyathā - ātmavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu pañcopādāna-skandheṣu rūpa-vedanā-saṃjñā-saṃskāra-vijñārnoṣvati ātmātmīya-rahiteṣu,
SA19nagsaliu:1427: pūrvākṣiptālaya-vijñānād astitva-vāsanā-bhedena tu dhātoḥ ākāra-viśeṣānanta-prasarānvitasya saṃskāra-skandha-saṃgṛhītatvāt saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA19nagsaliu:1430: vikalpanāvaśodbhūtālaya-vijñānasya vāsanopanibaddhatvād dhātorākāra-viśeṣa-bhedenānantaprasaro hi vijñānaskandha iti /
SA19nagsaliu:1433_0: tathāpi tatra ādāveva kartrādirahito riktastuccho 'sāra iti viditvā caturāryasatya-bhāvanānulomapravṛttyā
SA19nagsaliu:1435_1: ca tad-duḥkhamavagamya kleśālayavijñānavāsanāṃ saṃnihatya pudgaladharmanairātmyam avabudhya,
SA19nagsaliu:1437: skandhādau dhātau āyatane ca grāhya-grāhakatāṃ vihāya dharmanairātmyasamatāyāṃ praviśe,
SA19nagsaliu:1443: ya evaṃ tathatākṣamaḥ / tasmai vyākriyate nūnaṃ
SA19nagsaliu:1445: sa eva pudgaladharmanairātmyakṣamatānvitatvād anuttarasamyaksambodhiṃ vyākṛtavat paśyet,
SA19nagsaliu:1447: tasmāt sūtre- yo bhadanta śāriputra kulaputro kuladuhitā vā evaṃvidha-dharmakṣānti-samanvitaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:1448: tasya tathāgato 'rhat samyaksambuddho 'nuttaraḥ samyaksambodhiṃ vyākaroti ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1451: bodhisattvo maitreyo 'pi śālistambopamā kṛtā idaṃ sūtram vistareṇa vibhajya bhāṣitavān /
SA19nagsaliu:1452: bodhisattvamaitreyeṇa bhāṣitāṃ śālistambopamāṃ kṛtvā śāriputrastu tacchrutvā iti śālistambopamā kṛtā /
SA19nagsaliu:1457: saḥstuta iti tvayā yathoktaḥ tathaiva asti nānyatheti, avadhārayan nirjātatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1459: tasmādeva sūtre- atha āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitam abhinandya utthāyāsanāt prakrānta ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1460: maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamuktaṃ maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena,
SA19nagsaliu:1464: gatvā bhikṣubhyo gambhīrodārādbhutaṃ sūtraṃ yathāśrutavat sarvasattvahitāya bhāṣitam /
SA19nagsaliu:1468: bhāratīyopādhyāyena dharmaśrībhadreṇa lokacakṣuṣā bhadantasādhumatinā jñāna kumāreṇa cānūditā /
